backend/main.mo: Defines MCQ types, topics, and difficulties, and populates an inâ€‘memory question bank for the quiz canister.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature implementations with associated files, components, and test IDs for the MCQ quiz system.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Provides brief descriptions of key frontend files including App, quiz hooks, global styles, and Tailwind config.
frontend/index.css: Sets global Tailwind layers and defines a warm OKLCH color theme for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML shell loading the React app with a root div and module script.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React quiz UI handling start, question, and result screens with navigation and scoring logic.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages the backend actor, refreshing it when identity changes and invalidating dependent queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context, managing login, stored identities, and status states.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: React Query hooks for fetching MCQs and submitting answers via the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useQuiz.ts: Custom React hook that loads questions, orders them by difficulty, tracks quiz progress and answers, and submits results to compute score.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base stylesheet defining light and dark color themes using OKLCH variables and applying global styling.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry that initializes React, sets up React Query and Internet Identity providers, and renders the root component.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration enabling custom OKLCH color tokens, typography, container queries, animations, and theme extensions.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing implemented quiz features, visual theme requirements, and pending feature requests for the Class 9 History MCQ site.
